extension.name: Plugin Include Component
extension.author: Ander Juaristi
extension.description:
Plugin include component


Include any component in a article (without iframe).
Code is {component url='url' }
Replace url with the url to your component and include index.php?
For example:
{component url='index.php?option=com_component&Itemid=73&parameters....' }

You maybe need to change the url when using an SEF component. If you get a component not found when using normal url then use the SEF url. So not:
index.php?option=com_contact&lang=en&view=category
but:
Contact-Us/category/

field.name: ignore_script
field.label: Ignore scripts
field.description: Add here the scripts that has to be ignored. Enter each relative url on a new line

field.name: ignore_allscripts
field.label: Ignore all scripts
field.description: Ignore all hjavascripts and do not add them to the page where the component is included

field.name: ignore_style
field.label: Ignore stylesheets
field.description: Add here the stylesheets that has to be ignored. Enter each relative url on a new line

field.name: ignore_allstyles
field.label: Ignore all styles
field.description: Ignore all css styles and do not add them to the page where the component is included

field.name: method
field.label: Method
field.description: You can choose file_get_contents or curl. Curl has the best results, but requires curl library installed at PHP webserver

field.name: closesession
field.label: Close session
field.description: Close the session in Joomla to pass it to other component.

field.name: ignoresef
field.label: Ignore sef
field.description: Ignore sef and use normal parameter substitution.

field.name: cbreplace
field.label: CB Token replace
field.description: The plugin can replace the CB Tokens so it

field.name: urlprint
field.label: Use print
field.description: Use the print parameter in the url to call the extension to retieve only the extension and not other content

field.name: replprint
field.label: Remove print
field.description: Remove the print parameter in all links on the page (default) so links goto pages with template css include instead of only print.css.

field.name: repltmpl
field.label: remove tmpl
field.description: Remove the tmpl parameter in all links on the page (default) so links goto pages with full layout (header/modules) instead of only the component output.

field.name: runadmin
field.label: Run in Admin
field.description: USE WITH EXTREME CAUTION. Run the plugin in administrator of Joomla too. Only set this to yes if you know the plugin works in the frontend correctly and do it first on a test domain where you also have FTP acces or database to recover acces to the administrator!

field.name: caching
field.label: Caching
field.description: Use caching and override the general Joomla setting. If caching is enabled in Joomla it will use caching even if this parameter is set to off.
